data.name: Regular Burger
data.description: 1 pound Certified Angus Beef ® ground chuck. kosher salt, black pepper, onion powder, garlic powder, paprika, cayenne, sweet onion

data.name: Chicken Burger
data.description: Burger buns, Tyson® Individually Frozen Thin Sliced Boneless Skinless Chicken Breasts, bacon, tomato, avocado, red onion, watercress, mayo, ketchup & mustard

data.name: Pig patty
data.description: Soft brioche hamburger buns, cut in half, garlic, unsalted butter, softened, smoked bacon, ground beef (80/20 blend),Mornay Sauce, yellow American cheese, vidalia onion, heirloom tomato, iceberg lettuce

data.name: Truffle Fries
data.description: 2 ½ pounds russet potatoes, extra virgin olive oil, sea salt, freshly ground black pepper, truffle oil, parsley, grated parmesan cheese
